modules.description: This module implements a DNS client transport layer with support for plaintext and TLS connections, handling connection setup, message sending, and resource management. It works with IP addresses, DNS protocols, and MirageOS network stacks to enable DNS queries over configurable nameservers and transport settings. Concrete use cases include initiating DNS lookups, managing secure connections via TLS, and handling asynchronous I/O operations for networked DNS resolution.

This module implements a DNS client with support for synchronous and asynchronous DNS queries over plaintext or TLS transports. It handles domain name resolution, resource record retrieval, and EDNS configuration, working with IP addresses, DNS packets, and MirageOS network stacks. Concrete use cases include DNS lookups for IPv4 and IPv6 addresses, secure DNS resolution over TLS, and custom DNS record queries with configurable timeouts and nameservers.

This module defines a DNS client interface for MirageOS, supporting asynchronous DNS queries such as A, AAAA, and CNAME lookups over UDP or TCP. It works with domain names and IP addresses, handling packet serialization and response parsing. Concrete use cases include resolving hostnames in networked MirageOS applications like web clients or DNS forwarders.
